conditions: Generally healthy, occasional migraines (2-3 times per month)
medications: Birth control pill (Ortho Tri-Cyclen) daily, Ibuprofen 400mg as needed for migraines
goals: Wants to switch to a different birth control method, possibly an IUD. Needs a referral for that procedure. Also wants to discuss better migraine management options.
concerns: Current birth control pills sometimes cause nausea. Migraines seem to be getting more frequent, especially around menstrual cycle. Concerned about whether migraines are related to birth control.
personality: Direct, matter-of-fact, and efficient communicator. Knows what she wants and asks for it clearly. Not overly chatty but polite. Values her time and appreciates when healthcare is straightforward.
